channel.title: The Gauntlet Podcast: Become One, Balikbayan, Mutants in the Night
channel.description: On the new Gauntlet Podcast episode hosts @Auzumel_S and @edige23 speak with Jamila Nedjadi about *Become One*, *Balikbayan*, and *Mutants in the Night*. Plus discussion of representation, *The Outer Worlds*, *The Fog Knows Your Name*, and more. https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/the-gauntlet-podcast/become-one-balikbayan-mutants-in-the-night

item.title: The Gauntlet Podcast: Become One, Balikbayan, Mutants in the Night
item.dc:creator: @edige23
item.description:
@edige23 wrote:

On the new Gauntlet Podcast episode hosts @Auzumel_S and @edige23 speak with Jamila Nedjadi about Become One, Balikbayan, and Mutants in the Night. Plus discussion of representation, The Outer Worlds, The Fog Knows Your Name, and more.

THE GAUNTLET

Become One, Balikbayan, Mutants in the Night

iTunes:  https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/the-gauntlet-podcast/id951113347?mt=2 RSS:  http://gauntletpodcast.libsyn.com/rss
